Lewis Stein

Candid Portraits of Runners Series, This series consists of 24 sets of 5 images representing 12 men and 12 women. Individual images are 29" x 29" (73 x 73 cm) thus each piece is 29" x 145" (73 x 365 cm). As the Candid Portrait series the sequence of images of each piece in the series runs from left to right with one third of a second having elapsed between each. One example below. Others to be added later.
